txt.en: You've just received a map to a nearby milestone. This map will allow you to quickly return to that milestone from anywhere in the world. If you'd like to have your map take you to a different milestone, travel to that milestone and use it. Your map will now take you there!

You've just received a Milestone skill with a destination to a milestone nearby. The Milestone skill will allow you to quickly return to a Milestone you are bound to from anywhere in the world. If you'd like to have your skill take you to a different Milestone, travel to that Milestone and use it. Your Milestone skill will now take you there! Milestone skills can be quick-slotted for easier access to them and are named based on their destination.
